item.title: Homeless sleeping, 21st October
item.description:
Just to make you aware that the red door to this block of flats ( Marcon court 1-47) has been open for a couple of weeks. As I passed yesterday there was a man sleeping in there. His put a mattress and sofa in there. I think itâ€™s dangerous for him

item.title: Crack across road, 21st October
item.description:
This was supposed to be repaired before ref 7018642, but this crack affects my property, as I've explained several times before. When the buses hit the bump early morning or late at night, we can feel the vibration into the house. This has become a very frustrating situation, and I am very worried this will long-term damage my house. If I am unable to get this resolved, I will be writing to my MP. I have a long-term medical condition and shouldn't have to suffer from the noise vibration from a road that's not fit for purpose. Please can you look into repairing this crack.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 310, Burnt Oak Lane, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Just after Westerley Crescent Going towards Burnham Way. Area around utility cover is damaged Reported via desktop in the Road Defect category anonymously at 11:29, Tuesday 30 September 2025 Sent to Bromley Co, 21st October
item.description:
Hi. This was previously reported on 30th Sep 2025 under ref 8232624. It was closed down advising that this comes under Lewisham Council. This is incorrect. The Highways Inspector at Lewisham Council confirmed this actually with Bromley borough. Pls send someone to fix. Thx!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kangley Bridge Road, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car, 21st October
item.description:
Abandoned car parked behind block of flats on Green vale. DVLA checked - vehicle has not been taxed since 2021, and no MOT. Vehicle is in a poor condition. Believe tenants have moved out. Vehicle has been left for over 2 years.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Vale, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet
